content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 16}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 17}, {"type": "oak_sign", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 41, "index": 21}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "blue_terracotta", "quantity": 23, "index": 24}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 6, "index": 26}, {"type": "milk_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 25, "index": 30}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "acacia_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft brown stained glass, I first need to craft 8 glass blocks. Glass can be made from either red sand or sand. I have both in my inventory, so I'll use the red sand since there's less of it. I'll start by moving one of the red sand blocks to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
